contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox album<!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = ReDickUlous | Type = Remix album | Artist = [[Slick Idiot]] | Cover = Slick Idiot ReDickUlous-LG.gif | Caption = | Released = May 27, 2003 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Industrial music|Industrial]] | Length = 61:54 | Label = [[Itchy Records|Itchy]] | Producer = | Last album = ''[[DickNity]]''<br/>(2001) | This album = '''ReDickUlous'''<br/>(2003) | Next album = ''[[Screwtinized]]''<br/>(2004) }} '''''ReDickUlous''''' consists of [[remix]]es of songs off [[Slick Idiot]]'s first album, ''[[DickNity]]''. Eight of the tracks on the album are remixes performed by fans as part of a remix contest. ==Track listing== {{Track listing | title1 = Get Down - Give In | note1 = Remixed by Bard Torstensen of [[Clawfinger]] | length1 = 5:06 | title2 = It Won't Do | note2 = Surfacex Remix by Terran Westbrook | length2 = 4:47 | title3 = I Feel Fine | note3 = Soft Mix by Dead Combo | length3 = 4:09 | title4 = Lazy | note4 = Horny Refix by [[En Esch]] | length4 = 6:14 | title5 = It Won't Do | note5 = Grind Remix by Daniel Schmidt | length5 = 3:42 | title6 = Blast | note6 = Reality Mix by Great Mutant Skywheel | length6 = 4:37 | title7 = Merci Beaucoup | note7 = Merci Beauscrew by Loopy of [[Hanzel Und Gretyl]] | length7 = 2:32 | title8 = Merci Beaucoup | note8 = Equuleus Remix by Truth | length8 = 4:53 | title9 = Idiot | note9 = Dummkopf Desert Remix by Vas Kallas of [[Hanzel Und Gretyl]] | length9 = 5:43 | title10 = It Won't Do | note10 = Hart Aber Hertzlich Remix by Pure-X | length10 = 5:17 | title11 = It Won't Do | note11 = Chance's End Remix by Ryan Avery | length11 = 5:24 | title12 = Blast | note12 = Kaldbold Mix by F.Turiot@Kristen.Orb | length12 = 5:00 | title13 = I Feel Fine | note13 = Rodeo Mix by AL 9ER | length13 = 4:30 | total_length = 61:54 }} *Tracks 2–3, 5–6 and 10–13 are all fan remixes. {{DEFAULTSORT:Redickulous}} [[Category:Slick Idiot albums]] [[Category:2003 remix albums]] {{Slick Idiot}}
